TopicTitle: [WIP] JunkLauncher - stockalike Thor/Delta for your QBEsats!

Articles.Content:
UPDATE: I now have a texture artist! Blactheart612 has generously agreed to work on the project!

I'm in the process of modeling the Thor/Delta (Delta I) launch vehicle from the 1950s (notable as being the launcher that launched Echo 1). I am finished with the core stage, and modeling the fairings, though I can't seem to get them to work. More updates coming soon.

A render of the (texture-less) core stage:

EDIT: Just got finished with the engine model! It's a terrible model, but it'll do for now. I'll probably re-do it in some future update. Render coming soon.

EDIT: I've decided to use the LV-T30 engine as the main engine.

It's to be marketed as "Kerbin's least powerful launcher" (a parody of the Falcon Heavy being called "the world's most powerful rocket")

Edited May 9, 2015 by SpaceLaunchSystem
Seems like we had the same idea... link in sig

Yes yes yes, I got a lot of yes, please take it! Will you bee making other derivatives of Thor? Different upper stages and things, maybe the classic Thorad-Agena?

With Tantares, OMSK, TD, and Junk Launcher, my collection of stock-a-like missile-derived rockets will near completion! Muahahaha!
